name: Phobia (itch) (SamuraiDev)
description:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: When a minigame is complete, the game closes. It is completely intended. Any crashes anywhere else however, are unintended. Please report them in the comments section as well as some information about how they happened.

Since this is an early alpha, there are only three minigames.

Welcome to Phobia. A game tailored to your worst fears. Play a selection of different short (<1 minute) horror experiences, each based on a different Phobia. 

WASD to move, Mouse to look around. Most objects are interacted with by moving into them.

PHOBIA LIST

Acrophobia: Fear of heights. Walk on a winding plank from one skyscraper to another, without falling to your death.

Aquaphobia: Fear of water. Also contains Cleithrophobia, fear of being trapped. Escape a flooding room by activating mechanical locks with buttons.

Claustrophobia: Fear of small spaces. Also contains Hanifaphobia, the fear of being chased. Crawl away from a fast, ferocious floating demon in a small vent.

Isolophobia: Fear of isolation. Find your way through a vast desert using a few landmarks.

Nyctophobia: Fear of the dark. Walk an a dirt trail through the forest, as something approaches behind you.
